features.featureTitle: Update the Fleet vehicle represented by the selected image element (/html/body/div/div/main/section[2]/div/div[5]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1]) so it displays as “Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C” and uses a dedicated Saloon 4C image asset (instead of the current Coaster 4C image), by updating the corresponding entry in fleet data.
